org.jgentleframework.context.beans
Interface DefinitionAware

public interface DefinitionAware

Interface to be implemented by beans that wish to be aware of their owning Definition. After bean instantiation, container will be automatic invoke setDefinition(Definition) method and pass its owning Definition to the argument of method.

Note:

- The setDefinition(Definition) method will be invoked before the Initializing.activate() method is invoked.

- For a list of all bean lifecycle methods, see the Initializing and Disposable.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
Initializing, Disposable

Method Summary
 void setDefinition(Definition definition)
          Callback that supplies the owning Definition to a bean instance.
 

Method Detail

setDefinition

void setDefinition(Definition definition)
Callback that supplies the owning Definition to a bean instance. Invoked after the population of normal bean properties but before an initialization callback such as Initializing.activate() or a custom init-method.

Parameters:
definition - owning Definition (never null).
